relation: Geovany Soto replaces Mike Fontenot, playing catcher and batting seventh.
Todd Helton popped out to short. None on with one out and Miguel Olivo due up.
Miguel Olivo grounded out second to first. None on with two outs and Ian Stewart due up.
Ian Stewart struck out looking to end the inning.
